title: ICMR inks pact with NTPC Vidyut Vyapar Nigam to promote solar energy in healthcare research
description: ICMR has partnered with NTPC Vidyut Vyapar Nigam to boost sustainable energy in healthcare research. Under the agreement, rooftop solar panels will be installed at 15 institutes, with a combined capacity of 4,559 KW. This project promotes renewable energy and long-term cost efficiency, supporting India's national renewable energy goals and reducing ICMR's carbon footprint.
